list.s: . . his body is beautiful, athletic, warm and welcoming . . . his mouth softly moving, thrilling, familiar . . . his baseball hands, his football legs . . I realize now that I wasn't jealous of him because Dad liked him best, but of my dad because Blake liked him more than me . . . list.s: The allegation would have seemed bizarre if it hadn't been familiar: Two years earlier, coalition officials had accused another nonprofit of using "goon squads" of homeless men to roust other homeless people from ATM vestibules--charges later found to be groundless.

Director Ron Shelton ( Bull Durham ) is a veteran of successful sports movies, but this one lacks the "off-the-wall larkiness" of his previous efforts (Jay Carr, the Boston Globe ).
